document.full_text: the u.s. government sued a texas-based poultry company on wednesday, alleging the business engaged in a pattern of unlawful discrimination against developmentally disabled workers over more than 20 years.
document.title: turkey farm exploited, abused disabled workers: government
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government sued a texas-based poultry company on wednesday, alleging the business engaged in a pattern of unlawful discrimination against developmentally disabled workers over more than 20 years.
